title: 5/15 Kalista, me, is pushing instead of helping the team
body:
Said Kalista sold all (used to have a real build, did no damage because I was awful and everyone else was fed)  and built Zeals for MS and AS with tower damage pot and dragon buff. This kept Rengar away from team fights, as he kept hunting me down and using all his summoners, ults and item actives to kill me. I got 2 inhibitors and almost a tower. 

Entire team starts flaming me about "trolling" and "feeding on purpose" though I SAID that I built that way to push, and POINTED OUT the fact that I got 2 inhibs.

I went on tilt thx to the team harassing me.
